name: Chicken Life Sim
description:
The hottest new turn-based PSX RPG:

CHICKEN LIFE SIM

Experience exactly what it's like to live as a chicken on a small rural farm! Peck, scratch, and lay to survive against wild animals and vermin who threaten your existence as a chicken!

!This game was made in a week as part of a game-a-week university assesment. It is not meant to be anything more than a small prototype!
